 Hoodies   
 Hello everyone. 
 In case you did not know at this point we have all the round 2 hoodies. You can pick it up on Thursday between 1 20 and 1 50. Otherwise you will have to contact me.

 Filed under  News 
		February 4, 2012 · 3:47 pm	 
 Hoodie Sale #2!!!   
 Hey everyone! 
 We’re selling the next round of 100 hoodies on February 6th and 7th from 10 00 am till 4 00 pm on each day. We’re selling the hoodies on a first come first served basis. 
 Hoodies are 30 dollars each and there is a limit of three orders per person. You must be a psychology student to place an order. Don’t forget to bring your ID card.

		January 12, 2012 · 1:21 pm	 
 Office Hours for Winter Semester   
 Hey everyone! Our new office hours for winter 2012 will be: 
 Mondays: 10 – 1; 3 – 4 
 Tuesdays: 11:30 – 1 
 Wednesdays: 11 – 4 
 Thursday: 2 – 4  
 Leave a comment 
 Filed under  News 
		January 4, 2012 · 11:59 am	 
 Loyola Icebreaker Wine & Cheese   
 Hello and happy new year to all the psychology students! 
We hope you had a great break; sleep, food, family, friends, eggnog… 
Anyways, to welcome you back for a new semester we have an event already lined up for you: the Loyola Icebreaker Wine & Cheese! CUPA, along with the Applied Human Sciences Association and the Biology Students Association have organized an event happening at the Hive this Thursday the 5th from 6 – 10. There will be wine. There will be cheese. There will be beautiful people. And it’s all free. 
So come by, meet some new faces and hang out with old ones. You can invite people as well. Hope to see you there! 
 Leave a comment 
 Filed under  News 
		November 15, 2011 · 2:39 pm	 
 Psychology Hoodies!   
 Good news guys!!! 
We have a date for our hoodie orders! We will be selling the hoodies on November 29th and 30th from 10am – 3pm on both days. We will have a table set up in the SP Atrium (near the security office). We’ll have a big CUPA banner and some demo hoodies (so you can get an idea of the colours and the sizes). Remember, this year you can get a quote on the back of your hoodie for no extra charge. As always, hoodies cost $30 each. More good news: unlike previous years, we will be having two shipments, one per semester. So if you’re going away this winter, you won’t have to wait until next year to pick up your hoodie. If you’re not going away, well, you’ll get to be stylish starting December 🙂 
Resources are limited so we can only take 100 orders this semester. 3 orders max per person. First come, first serve, so come quickly! And bring your Concordia IDs. Also, the hoodies are reserved for undergraduate psychology students at Concordia only

 Office Hours   
 Hey everyone! 
We have officially updated our weekly office hours. Check the “Contact Us” tab for information on how to, you know, contact us. 
The new office hours will be there! 
 Leave a comment 
 Filed under  News 
		September 6, 2011 · 11:41 am	 
 Welcome back!   
 Hey everybody! 
Well, it’s been another short summer and here we are back again. We hope you enjoyed your time off 🙂 
We are planning some interesting activities and events this semester for you psychology people. Stay posted! We will also be updating our office hours shortly so keep an eye out for that if you want to speak to us in person. Enjoy your semester!
